# `r emos`

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| fig.alt: "Description of the plot - PLEASE FILL IN"
library(tidyverse)
library(emo)
library(here)
library(gganimate)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ragg)

set.seed(42)

anim <- penguins |>
  drop_na() |>
  mutate(
    emoji = case_when(
      sex == "female" ~ emo::ji("pizza"),
      sex == "male" ~ emo::ji("penguin")
    )
  ) |>
  mutate(
    angle = sample(
      0:360,
      size = n(),
      replace = TRUE
    )
  ) |>
  select(
    emoji,
    angle,
    mass = body_mass_g,
    flipper = flipper_length_mm,
    year
  ) |>
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = mass,
      y = flipper
    )
  ) +
  geom_text(
    aes(
      label = emoji,
      angle = angle
    ),
    size = 13,
  ) +
  coord_trans(x = "log", y = "log") +
  labs(
    title = paste0(
      "PENGUIN",
      emo::ji("penguin"),
      "PIZZA",
      emo::ji("pizza"),
      "PARTY",
      emo::ji("party"),
      collapse = ""
    ),
    x = paste0(
      emo::ji("island"),
      "maybe latitude or longitude",
      collapse = "  "
    ),
    y = paste0(emo::ji("sun"), "temperature (K)", collapse = "  ")
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    axis.text = element_text(angle = 180),
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 30),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 30),
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 2),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 2),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#ffcc5c"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#ffeead"),
    panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "#ff6f69"),
    panel.grid.minor = element_line(color = "#96ceb4")
  ) +
  transition_states(
    transition_length = 1,
    state_length = 0.001,
    year
  ) +
  enter_grow() +
  exit_shrink() +
  view_follow()

ppp_plot <- animate(anim, device = "ragg_png", renderer = gifski_renderer())

anim_save(
  filename = "penguin-pizza-party.gif",
  animation = ppp_plot,
  path = here("img")
)
```
